topic.title: 第一帖
topic.body: 欢迎测试，这部分其他地方是看不到的，只能从指定链接进来，才能看到。

topic.title: Can cloned site use the address generated by vanitygen？
topic.body:
In other words，how can I make the site  manual created the same to an existent site (as ZeroTalk)?
Thanks very much!

topic.title: Thanks for seeding my new site
Can I mute someone in ZeroTalk page just as ZeroMe?
topic.body:
Click the id,then click ‘mute’.
Its inconvenient to mute id in ZeroID page.

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Can I use command line to  quit 'ZeroNet.exe' in windows? Thanks a lot.

1_1A1shyBkcauJ91h2Yuxn84Ca6wD8k3i5Qs.body:
> [kaerduo](#comment_4_1A1shyBkcauJ91h2Yuxn84Ca6wD8k3i5Qs): 可是并没有很好的理解
看一下这个，新手快速3步建站：
http://127.0.0.1:43110/leafok.bit/?Post:19

3_1Q2yjutP8VevpmW5ZuKzNcDUQbUFn3gsVT.body:
> [ivanq](#comment_28_1CvyxRucf7BbDvGtFe5LayTS2qX88VN7Er): Simply create a new site and rename its folder.
Can I clone a site and rename its folder?

> [nofish](#comment_993_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Yes, you can. Stop client, Rename the folder, Start client again, and enter http://127.0.0.1:43110/1vanity.. (You have to re-sign every content.json file after that)

Thanks a lot!

1_1HtGfHk2MuqcB5nYXZ6b2NajXJLoxfq7XS.body:
> [nofish](#comment_979_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): I just tried and it's works for me: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1J8Sun9nxvpiHvuXgbExDCbadPqWYGQpHm [...]

It works,thanks a lot!
